message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us.
I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This is a good deal before inflation cuts into it further.
Come on, Bob! Inflation is eating into your share, let's settle on 58-42 before it gets worse for you.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer before inflation makes it pointless for me to even bother.
Bob, you're losing value fast! 55-45 is more than fair considering the circumstances.
